results.content: I would love to see more fashion-specific discussion in the videos rather than just a summary of general setup topics and the author's affiliate links (ie - what plugins work best for fashion?  what are the best ways to set up your fashion blog with IG, etc)

results.content: Everything I need to start a fashion blog of my own. Thanks.
results.content_html: Everything I need to start a fashion blog of my own. Thanks.

results.content:
Really disappointed by this. I wish I could refund it but I'm outside the 30 day window. I feel I got suckered. 

Nothing at all about the "Fashion" industry other than saying "check out this fashion blog, now check out this other fashion blog".
How about information about growing a fashion blog? How to collaborate with other fashion brands? How to photograph or video for fashion.  Set up lighting for fashion photography? 
I feel like he knows 0 about fashion, why is he making a course on it?

Even the examples he used were about making money online and creating a blog, nothing about Fashion. 

Just the same basic info you can find for free all over Youtube: Get a domain name, get an account on Bluehost, install wordpress, blah blah. Ive heard it 300 times at this point.

response.content: Sorry you were unhappy with the course. The course description and outline clearly lays out what is covered in this course. It's a WordPress/Blogging reference guide and not a 'how to' for fashion bloggers to improve images/lighting/photography.
response.content_html: Sorry you were unhappy with the course. The course description and outline clearly lays out what is covered in this course. It's a WordPress/Blogging reference guide and not a 'how to' for fashion bloggers to improve images/lighting/photography.
